text:
Nelly Beatriz Bonnet (11 December 1930 – 19 February 2020) was an Argentine actress and comedian. She acted on stage and screen. Her movie credits include "Mansedumbre" (1953), "Canario rojo" (1955), "Novia para dos" (1956) and "El Profesor erótico" (1976).
Bonnet was born in Gualeguay, Entre Ríos. She died due to Alzheimer's disease on 19 February 2020 in Buenos Aires. She was 89.
